Articles.Content:
hello yesterday i had a problem that ksp didnt run when i started it, it just showed the loading bar and nothing else (the loading bar wasnt moving either). so i tried to reinstall my game but when my game is 99% installed it say the update is paused or canceled so i have to start the install again(with the same problem happening every time)

if anybody out there know how i can fix this i would very much like to know

thanks

(sry for bad english)
